content.raw:
deprecating these member variables causes compiler warnings when they are initialized in the constructor:
~~~

/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:53:9: warning: ‘gazebo::physics::Joint::useCFMDamping’ is deprecated (declared at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_sdformat/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.hh:523) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
